tags: am i asking too much here?
summary: Things I really, really want to happen in IX
body:
Things I really, really want to happen in IX

- Obviously Reylo being cannon would be pretty damn good (I mean a kiss would also be amazing pls JJ ur our only hope)

- Pretty pretty please can Ben/Kylo not die? That’s literally my biggest ask

- I would also really like a Ben Solo smile wouldn’t that be a lovely thing

- A major reach but I’m still very pro Finn/Poe and I thought it was a really natural progression for their relationship to take but its clear they don’t wanna go that way. If not, can we please have more of them hanging out being awesome badasses?

- If Rey and Ben get to fly the Falcon together then I am 100% done RIP me

- For God’s sake flesh out Rose this time, there was no reason why she couldn’t be a good character and Kelly Marie Tran is a sweetheart but they just reduced her to a weepy conflict for Finn come random love interest - it didn’t work and I want her to be given some decent writing to work with this time

- Everything is Lando and nothing hurts

- I’m very pro Rey and Ben going down a more Grey Jedi route (and that seems evident from the themes we’ve seen so far) so I’m really hoping we’ll get to see that rather than a rehash of the Luke + Vader redemption arc where one helps the other and commits an act of sacrifice etc. This also ties heavily into not wanting Ben to die. I’m all for redeeming Ben Solo but in a way that a) doesn’t involve him dying and b) being a mutual thing where both him and Rey have learned things and come to an understanding about their place in the galaxy and the changes that need to come to future Force users

- While I’m not sure if it’s something I want per se, I’m quite heavily buying into this ‘Rey accidentally killing her parents by crashing their ship when they left her’ theory. However while it is interesting, I think it may complicate the narrative this late in

- Although saying that, I think we should leave Rey’s parentage be for now. Its been done, let’s move on

- ALL OF THE MAZ KANATA

- Another badass tag-team fight between our favourite force users pls and thank u

- It’s looking likely we’ll get it - Force Ghost Luke boiiiii

- I really enjoyed Hux in the first film but didn’t like how he was reduced to a joke in TLJ, I’d like to see his petty, sneaky self-servience more in the final chapter

- I’d also like Poe’s character to have mellowed out a bit - he’s learnt to trust those around him better, calm down his trigger happy nature and be less entitled, so I’d like to see this in action now

- I felt like Finn got shafted a bit in TLJ too - more Finn pls. I’d also like some Finn/Rey adventures and teaming up

- For gads sake let’s give Chewie something good this movie he’s had such a rough time of it

- Rey being a badass literally all day every day

- It won’t happen but can u imagine if they played Across the Stars gdjdkshdofjfof (I’m not really an Amidala fan - don’t get me started - but it’s such a beautiful iconic theme)

- On the musical front, more use of Rey’s Theme please!

- For Leia to get a respectful and meaningful conclusion without jumbling whatever footage they have to make something work

- Just imagine folks - imagine if we got an Obi Wan/Ewan McGregor cameo. Just imagine it.

- Rey and Ben live together happily ever after with a flock of adopted porgs ok bye

Val: the SW storyline is more serious
Ark: Watch me make a comedy out of it by flirting with Quinn, sassing Baras at every...
body:
Val: the SW storyline is more serious
Ark: Watch me make a comedy out of it by flirting with Quinn, sassing Baras at every opportunity and generally goofing around when I don't consider the issue important enough.

blog.name: mandowords
blog.title: Miit'alor
blog.description: I am a descriptivist linguist for the Mando'a language. I show what it can do, not what it MUST do. This is a place for discussion about Mando'a, and Mandalorian society and culture. Feel free to use the head cannons from this blog (or reblogged from others) in your RP or writing. All words and descriptions are taken from the mandoa.org Mandalorian Dictionary. Want to support this blog? Buy me a Kofi? OR buy some Mando'a themed items? Visit our Discord? Blog icon by Rina

blog.name: swpromptsandasks
blog.title: StarWars prompts and asks
blog.description: Send me your best (weird, nsfw and cute) prompts and asks for Star wars and if they contain Obi-Wan then hurray for me. Lets see what we can drum up. (I don't write for the last trilogy, apologies)

summary: Cat cuddles- Anakin and Obi propose to each other.
question: Cat cuddles- Anakin and Obi propose to each other.
answer:
Staring at each other, equally flabbergasted, Obi-Wan and Anakin wondered how they got to this moment.

Sitting on their couch curled together, Obi-Wan’s tail around the blond’s waist with each of them holding a jewelry box.

Lips twitching along with his ears, Obi-Wan sniggered and shifted into Anakin’s lap. “You… when did you… I was going to…” He laughed to hard to finish his sentence and rubbed his cheek to the others while purring in happiness as he pressed the jewelry box to his chest that Anakin had given him, a golden hoop earring on about eighteen mm in size with a sunstone closer in it that was catching the light and making it seem like it was glowing like a setting sun.

Snorting in amusement, catching what Obi-Wan was asking despite the laugh, Anakin set the blue box Obi-Wan had given him on the couch beside him. “I just… Padme mentioned it and I couldn’t help but think about it and then… what about you? How long have you been planning this?” Anakin  pressed little butterfly kisses all over the others face in joy.

Squirming happily, Obi-Wan flickered his tail with a happy mewl. “Bail, Bail said I should, that I make you happy and that asking you would allow us to bond in the eyes of the law too.” He beamed in joy.

He had been worried about the reaction Anakin would have but that fear had disappeared the moment he had seen the earring in the red box Anakin had presented to him.

“You beautiful, wonderful, delightful menace.” The Senator crooned in delight, pressing a kiss to Obi-Wan’s face at each word before taking the felinoides lips for a good long snog that left them both breathless and content as Obi-Wan shifted until he was straddling the man’s lap and could wrap his arms around the human’s shoulders with his nails digging through the curls to cup the back of Anakin’s head.

“A-Are you going to open your box yet?” Obi-Wan panted out with a soft laugh, wiggling on Anakin’s lap with an excited look on his face.

Jumping a bit as he was reminded of the second jewlery box, Anakin picked it back up from beside him and clicked it open, peering into it.

It was a cuff just as Anakin had expected, in a sleek silvery blue metal, it was clearly meant to rest on his wrist and reach midway up his arm like a brace would and had a narrow opening on the underside. On the top there were two black krayt dragons twined around each other in battle which had been engraved and inlaid with a darker metal to reflect the black hide of the creature native to Tatooine, fierce and beautiful.

“…I expected a feline almost…” Anakin whispered in awe.

Taking the brace out of the silky inside, Obi-Wan carefully helped Anakin put it on before putting some pressure on it to press it tight to Anakin’s arm so it wouldn’t slide. “Krayt dragons are from Tatooine, you are from Tatooine my fierce mate.”

It would take some time getting used to but Anakin would be more than happy to wear it for the rest of his life as he pulled Obi-Wan into a kiss. “Tomorrow, I’ll take you to get an ear pierced and get your hoop set in. And start preparing for a wedding.” He whispered heatedly.

The tone had Obi-Wan wrapping his arms around Anakin’s shoulders to hold on as the blond stood, purring excitedly when the blond groped his rear. “But now?”

“But right now, I’m taking you to bed my fiance.” Anakin stole one more kiss, blindly heading towards the bedroom with a delighted feline in his arms.

reblog.comment:
Staring at each other, equally flabbergasted, Obi-Wan and Anakin wondered how they got to this moment.

Sitting on their couch curled together, Obi-Wan’s tail around the blond’s waist with each of them holding a jewelry box.

Lips twitching along with his ears, Obi-Wan sniggered and shifted into Anakin’s lap. “You… when did you… I was going to…” He laughed to hard to finish his sentence and rubbed his cheek to the others while purring in happiness as he pressed the jewelry box to his chest that Anakin had given him, a golden hoop earring on about eighteen mm in size with a sunstone closer in it that was catching the light and making it seem like it was glowing like a setting sun.

Snorting in amusement, catching what Obi-Wan was asking despite the laugh, Anakin set the blue box Obi-Wan had given him on the couch beside him. “I just… Padme mentioned it and I couldn’t help but think about it and then… what about you? How long have you been planning this?” Anakin  pressed little butterfly kisses all over the others face in joy.

Squirming happily, Obi-Wan flickered his tail with a happy mewl. “Bail, Bail said I should, that I make you happy and that asking you would allow us to bond in the eyes of the law too.” He beamed in joy.

He had been worried about the reaction Anakin would have but that fear had disappeared the moment he had seen the earring in the red box Anakin had presented to him.

“You beautiful, wonderful, delightful menace.” The Senator crooned in delight, pressing a kiss to Obi-Wan’s face at each word before taking the felinoides lips for a good long snog that left them both breathless and content as Obi-Wan shifted until he was straddling the man’s lap and could wrap his arms around the human’s shoulders with his nails digging through the curls to cup the back of Anakin’s head.

“A-Are you going to open your box yet?” Obi-Wan panted out with a soft laugh, wiggling on Anakin’s lap with an excited look on his face.

Jumping a bit as he was reminded of the second jewlery box, Anakin picked it back up from beside him and clicked it open, peering into it.

It was a cuff just as Anakin had expected, in a sleek silvery blue metal, it was clearly meant to rest on his wrist and reach midway up his arm like a brace would and had a narrow opening on the underside. On the top there were two black krayt dragons twined around each other in battle which had been engraved and inlaid with a darker metal to reflect the black hide of the creature native to Tatooine, fierce and beautiful.

“…I expected a feline almost…” Anakin whispered in awe.

Taking the brace out of the silky inside, Obi-Wan carefully helped Anakin put it on before putting some pressure on it to press it tight to Anakin’s arm so it wouldn’t slide. “Krayt dragons are from Tatooine, you are from Tatooine my fierce mate.”

It would take some time getting used to but Anakin would be more than happy to wear it for the rest of his life as he pulled Obi-Wan into a kiss. “Tomorrow, I’ll take you to get an ear pierced and get your hoop set in. And start preparing for a wedding.” He whispered heatedly.

The tone had Obi-Wan wrapping his arms around Anakin’s shoulders to hold on as the blond stood, purring excitedly when the blond groped his rear. “But now?”

“But right now, I’m taking you to bed my fiance.” Anakin stole one more kiss, blindly heading towards the bedroom with a delighted feline in his arms.

blog.name: swpromptsandasks
blog.title: StarWars prompts and asks
blog.description: Send me your best (weird, nsfw and cute) prompts and asks for Star wars and if they contain Obi-Wan then hurray for me. Lets see what we can drum up. (I don't write for the last trilogy, apologies)

summary: *dies a little inside* Moddy, you're breaking my heart with these SilentScreams updates! Please tell me Anakin pulls off a...
question: *dies a little inside* Moddy, you're breaking my heart with these SilentScreams updates! Please tell me Anakin pulls off a rescue and the good Chancellor seems to have died in some extreme accident? I bet he pulls the clones in on it to
answer:
Coughing harshly, Obi-Wan struggled to pull his arms to his chest with no luck as the broken limbs were left utterly useless when the Sith had been done with him what felt like hours before though Obi-Wan imagined it may have been shorter but time ran together in the dark room that now stunk of urine and blood after hours of physical and psychical torture as Sidious had ripped up Obi-Wan’s weak mental shielding that had been built during the time with his friends and his Qui-Gon.

Sidious had not been pleased with him however, had not been pleased with the feeble resistance Obi-Wan had put up to the man’s mind invasion.

The Sith had of course broken in with ease but it was the attempted resistance that had enraged the Sith who had expected Obi-Wan to just submit like before. He had gloated about the death of Qui-Gon, had gloated about Obi-Wan once more speaking and Sidious being able to pull screams from his throat once more.

But resistance to keep the man out?

No that had not endeared Obi-Wan to the old man at all and the punishment both from not returning to his master and the attempted defiance had been ruthless and agonizing until the man had suddenly been called away.

Leaving Obi-Wan in a puddle of his own blood and urine.

There was more to come, there was always more.

These injuries would not kill him, that much Obi-Wan was certain of as he suffered worse from before and survived and he cried soundlessly at the delay of seeing his Qui-Gon once more.

‘And he is coming back!’ Obi-Wan squirmed fruitfully with damaged legs, a feeble attempt at escape as he heard steps in the hall outside.

There was a beep and light flooded the room, Obi-Wan flinching as his damaged eyes were overwhelmed and his broken body ached with fresh waves of pain.

Any moment now, a fresh hell would restart with more pain as Sidious had clearly been interrupted earlier.

“Obi-Wan?” A male horrified voice said.

A voice that was not Sidious.

Forcing his swollen eyes open while wondering if he was having hallucinations, Obi-Wan squinted up as the dark shape in the doorway moved further in and knelt down by him and one broken lightrod later a weak glow lit the room.

Quinlan.

It was Quinlan Vos, Obi-Wan would remember that face anywhere as it was the first time he had disobeyed Sidious and gotten away with it, leaving the Jedi alive if with a broken arm.

Force Obi-Wan had even meet the man in the temple, the two greeting each other shortly with Quinlan showing he held no ill will.

Quinlan smiled gently at him, brown eyes full of sympathy as he touched Obi-Wan’s bruise covered cheek gently. “Lets get you back to Qui-Gon huh? He’s waiting for you in the Halls.” He whispered quietly while loosening his silver communicator from his belt.

Blinking dazedly up at the Jedi, Obi-Wan swallowed the blood in his mouth to speak. “Qui?” He breathed out in confusion.

Stopping mid sentence, Quinlan looked down at him before softening. “Yes, he’s in the Halls. He’s pretty banged up but he’s alive.” The man confirmed before focusing on his comm. “Skywalker, I found him, he’s down in the basement through a hidden passage. Its open now so you should easily find it… bring the troopers and,” He glanced down at Obi-Wan, his features twisting. “Bring a stretcher too, there is no way Obi-Wan is walking.” He said in a grimmer tone.

Obi-Wan didn’t care if he ever got to walk again.

Qui-Gon was alive!
